languages.text:
Fires a single stinger pod shot that deals <u>(from 12 to 21)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and has 100% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.
Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Fires a single stinger pod shot that deals 12–21 damage and has 100% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Can only be used once per combat.

Fires a single stinger pod shot that deals <u>(from 12 to 21)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and has 100% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.
Can only be used once per combat.

Fires a single stinger pod shot that deals <u>(from 12 to 21)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and has 100% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.
Can only be used once per combat.

languages.text:
发射单发毒刺弹。此次攻击造成<u>12-21</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，拥有100%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，如果未能通过检定，则会{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
此能力每场战斗只能使用一次。
languages.original_text: A marvellous compact weapon in the form of a ring that allows the wearer to fire a {g|f:8d027d39ba084d95ac87af84b59c9029}Stinger Shot{/g} once per combat.

traits.locale_text: 这枚精巧的手环可以令装备者每场战斗使用一次{g|f:8d027d39ba084d95ac87af84b59c9029}毒刺射击{/g}。

发射单发毒刺弹。此次攻击造成<u>12-21</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，拥有100%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，如果未能通过检定，则会{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
此能力每场战斗只能使用一次。

languages.text:
Позволяет совершить выстрел, аналогичный выстрелу из жалящего пускателя, наносящий <u>(от 12 до 21)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 100%. Цель выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получает {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушение{/g} на 1 раунд.
Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.
languages.original_text:
Fires a single stinger pod shot that deals 12–21 damage and has 100% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Позволяет совершить выстрел, аналогичный выстрелу из жалящего пускателя, наносящий 12–21 урона с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 100%. Цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получает {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушение{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

Позволяет совершить выстрел, аналогичный выстрелу из жалящего пускателя, наносящий 12–21 урона с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 100%. Цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получает {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушение{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

languages.text:
<u>12～21</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え100%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ、1発のスティンガーポッドショットを発射する。ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}抵抗判定{/g}を成功させなければ、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}になる。
1回の戦闘で1回のみ使用可能。
languages.original_text:
Fires a single stinger pod shot that deals <u>(from 12 to 21)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and has 100% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
12〜21のダメージを付与／{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通力{/g}100%／スティンガーポッドショットを1発発射。ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を成功させない場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}効果を付与。
各戦闘で1回のみ使用可能。

<u>12～21</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え100%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ、1発のスティンガーポッドショットを発射する。ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}抵抗判定{/g}を成功させなければ、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}になる。
1回の戦闘で1回のみ使用可能。

languages.text:
Dispara un único aguijón camuflado que inflige <u>(de 12 a 21)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y tiene 100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}. El objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} durante 1 asalto.
Solo funciona una vez por combate.
languages.original_text:
Fires a single stinger pod shot that deals <u>(from 12 to 21)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and has 100% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.
Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Dispara un único aguijón camuflado que inflige 12–21 de daño y tiene 100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}. El objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
Solo funciona una vez por combate.

languages.text:
Feuert einen Schmerzprojektorschuss ab, der <u>(12 bis 21)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} verursacht und 100 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} hat. Das Ziel muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-Widerstands-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}probe{/g} bestehen, sonst wird es für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}.
Kann nur einmal pro Kampf verwendet werden.
languages.original_text: A marvellous compact weapon in the form of a ring that allows the wearer to fire a {g|f:8d027d39ba084d95ac87af84b59c9029}Stinger Shot{/g} once per combat.

traits.locale_text: Eine ausgezeichnete kompakte Waffe in Form eines Rings, die dem Träger einmal pro Kampf das Abfeuern eines {g|f:8d027d39ba084d95ac87af84b59c9029}Stinger-Schusses{/g} ermöglicht.

Feuert einen Schmerzprojektorschuss ab, der <u>(12 bis 21)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} verursacht und 100 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} hat. Das Ziel muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-Widerstands-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}probe{/g} bestehen, sonst wird es für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}.
Kann nur einmal pro Kampf verwendet werden.

languages.text:
Tire un module venimeux qui inflige <u>(entre 12 et 21)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} avec 100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}. La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, faute de quoi elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} pendant 1 round.
Utilisable une fois par combat.
languages.original_text:
Fires a single stinger pod shot that deals <u>(from 12 to 21)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and has 100% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.
Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Tire une salve de module venimeux qui inflige 12 à 21 points de dégâts avec 100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}. La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}, faute de quoi elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Utilisable une fois par combat.

Tire un module venimeux qui inflige <u>(entre 12 et 21)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} avec 100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}. La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, faute de quoi elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} pendant 1 round.
Utilisable une fois par combat.

languages.text: A marvellous compact weapon in the form of a ring that allows the wearer to fire a {g|f:8d027d39ba084d95ac87af84b59c9029}Stinger Shot{/g} once per combat.

traits.locale_text: A marvellous compact weapon in the form of a ring that allows the wearer to fire a {g|f:8d027d39ba084d95ac87af84b59c9029}Stinger Shot{/g} once per combat.

languages.text: Takan kişinin her çatışmada bir kez {g|f:8d027d39ba084d95ac87af84b59c9029}İğneli Atışı{/g} yapabilmesini sağlayan muhteşem bir kompakt silah.
languages.original_text: A marvellous compact weapon in the form of a ring that allows the wearer to fire a {g|f:8d027d39ba084d95ac87af84b59c9029}Stinger Shot{/g} once per combat.

traits.locale_text: Takan kişinin her çatışmada bir kez {g|f:8d027d39ba084d95ac87af84b59c9029}İğneli Atışı{/g} yapabilmesini sağlayan muhteşem bir kompakt silah.
